## Testing
- [ ] Tested with `visa_stock_data.csv` (time-series dataset)
- [ ] Tested with `amazon_sales_dataset.csv` (categorical dataset)
- [ ] Both Data Scientist and Business Analyst tabs render without errors
- [ ] Gemini toggle works (enabled and disabled states)
- [ ] Rule-based fallback renders cleanly when Gemini is off
- [ ] No uncaught exceptions on bad or empty input
- [ ] App does not recompute agents on reruns (session state stable)
